channel.title: Right i av pimpscape what next?
channel.description:
Alright i have pimpscape what do i do next to make a server
explain as fully as u can plz
p.s. dont give me any ultimate server guides i tried and not helped :( someone with a server can help me plz[br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 11:41:52 AM[/size][hr]dont just read help me :mad:

item.title: Right i av pimpscape what next?

item.source: Right i av pimpscape what next?

item.title: Right i av pimpscape what next?
item.dc:creator: @warmwaddle warmwaddle
item.description:
@warmwaddle wrote:

Uhhh the easy way is with hamachi…first create a network on hamachi, which should be self explanatory. Now, since you just downloaded pimpscape you need winrar, which can be found at www.download.com, download then install winrar. Then right click pimpscape and it should say “extract here”. Just click that and it should make another folder. Open the folder and you should see a ton of files…one of them is runserver.bat, double click it and the server starts. Now just open the moparscape client, click new server, then log in to 127.0.0.1 and your on.

NOTE: its only 127.0.0.1 for you, for other players its your ip on hamachi.

Read full topic
